2015}}, 'description': 'Starting in 2013, StudyPortals together with 8 partners decided to make choosing a programme of study in Europe more interactive, improving the experience for prospective international students and the institutions that hope to recruit them. To achieve this, “EduCoach” was selected by the European Commission as part of a highly competitive Erasmus Mundus Action 3 line of funding.\nEduCoach was designed to help millions of prospective students and PhD candidates who were considering study and research in Europe. Tools like live chat and webinars were implemented to improve the quality of their decision-making process on where and what to study, as well as to help institutions reach out to these students more effectively. Studyportals is the leading two-sided online marketplace where students find their perfect international education programme, and universities recruit their best-matching international students. As a big believer in the value of international education, this is incredibly rewarding: over 485,000 students on our platform turned their dream into reality and started studying abroad.

As member of the global executive team, I focused on the growth of our innovative, industry-changing business model with a two-sided marketplace matching students and universities globally. Responsibilities included business strategy, marketing (b2b and b2c), strategic partnerships, product and process innovation, key account management, and growing our value to our partners globally.', 'title': 'Chief Growth Officer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Eindhoven Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Studyportals', 'description': 'Part of global executive team with a broad general management role. 

Shared responsibility on all company level KPIs, including revenue, bookings, user growth and stickiness of the platform, number of student enrolments, student and client satisfaction, employee engagement, and EBITDA. My focus was typically on long term strategy and essential projects on product, marketing, or sales. 

Achievements:
- Successfully rolled out new business model based on commission fees for actual student enrolments, including changes to product, marketing, sales, processes, and organization. 
- Repositioned Studyportals products and brand from course search website to enabling the Best Match between students and universities
- Developed an award winning Best Fit tool that enables students to assess their match with a university 
- Constant double-digit revenue growth
- Scaled from 60 to 200+ people in 3 years
- 370,000 students enrolled in higher education programmes worldwide in 2017, after having used our platform', 'title': 'Chief Operating Officer (COO)', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Eindhoven Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Studyportals', 'description': 'Member of the executive team, building and leading a team of 15 FTE in Eindhoven and 40 FTE in Bucharest. Responsibilities included R&D, Product strategy, UX, full funnel B2B and B2C marketing, strategic partnerships, and project management. Achievements reached: 

* Innovation: built great products, helping students worldwide to find & choose the best matching course. Includes portals for distance learning, language learning, foundation programmes, student reviews, and others. 
* Marketing: boosted visitor growth (>200% in 3 years) and full funnel conversion rates
* Global transparency in education: listing all English-taught Bachelor and Master degrees (and equivalent degree levels) of the top 1000 universities worldwide
* Succesfully managed various EU funded projects, twice selected as "success story" by the European Commission
* Founded & built our Bucharest branche office (from 0 to 40 FTE in 2 years)', 'title': 'Director Of Marketing And Product Development', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Eind', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'Studyportals', 'description': 'Responsible for product innovation and project management.
